contest-event.event-date:
Feb. 13, 2000 D Milton Keynes Brass Band Festival (Fourth Section)
Milton Keynes Brass Band Festival (Fourth Section) 40 Entertainments Contest Milton Keynes Brass Band Festival milton-keynes-brass-band-festival-fourth-section
Stantonbury Theatre, Milton Keynes, Buckinghamshire, England, UK Bands played an entertainment programme including Shenandoah. 11 bands competed. Best Instrumentalist: Chris Boiston, Trombone, Hungerford Town
1st Prize: £300.00 (Cecil Bowden Memorial trophy) 2nd Prize: £100.00 (Milton Keynes Bourough trophy) 3rd Prize: £60.00 (Bejam trophy)
March 7, 2011, 4 p.m. March 7, 2011, 4:01 p.m.
1 Raunds Temperance Band John Fletcher
2 Hungerford Town Band Tim Crouter
3 Cross Keys Silver Band Kerry Bowden
